title: Vista Loader v3.0.0.1 Clean Bios Emulation Loader
description:
Vista Loader v3.0.0.1 Clean Bios Emulation Loader
(Fixed Version, no missing Logo errors!)

This is the newest vista crack! It has a clean loading screen!
Use this to activate Windows Vista Service Pack 1 / RTM x86 and x64 editions, using 15 different Bios emulations plus 18 official OEM Logos for Windows Vista.

Supports:

    * Windows Vista Home Basic
    * Windows Vista Home Premium
    * Windows Vista Business
    * Windows Vista Ultimate
    * Windows Vista Enterprise (Use the NO LOGO button).



If you use the NO LOGO button, Vista will be activated with ASUS emulation
without OEM LOGOS.

Click on the Brand you want, wait the confirmation message and reboot;
You can view the Vista activation status by clicking the GENUINE logo;


Unable To Activate Vista??
Well look no further!

Ok this is for people whose windows vista shows a product key in system information, but is not activated. It is likely that this will work for you when no other cracks do!
I had this problem and tried many things to fix it (reinstalled vista 7 times), which i eventually did. It was caused by the old invalid product key remaining from my old vista installation (i have no idea how the key stayed there even though i formatted my entire drive, but i mean cmon its microsoft!)

Ok heres how we do it.

Run the crack, and ONLY click install key. Wait (may take a few minutes) until you recieve a message saying product key installed successfully, then exit the program.
DO NOT REBOOT.
